mapper.select: select t_contents.id, t_contents.user_id, t_users.nickname, t_contents.created_datetime, t_contents.views, t_contents.contents, t_contents.title, count(t_likes.id) as count from t_contents inner join t_likes on t_contents.id = t_likes.contents_id inner join t_users on t_contents.user_id = t_users.id where t_contents.blind = 0 group by t_contents.id;
